men-hair.title: Men's Hair Services
men-hair.subtitle: Hair Services for Men
men-hair.description: Gentlemen, a great haircut is more than just a trim – it's personal style. At Winchair Beauty Spa, you're investing in true quality and sustainable style that's truly worth it.

mens-haircut.title: Men's Haircut
mens-haircut.subtitle: Men's Haircut
mens-haircut.description: A custom-designed haircut, perfect for your style and lifestyle.
mens-haircut.longDescription: A custom-designed haircut, perfect for your style and lifestyle. Includes a relaxing shampoo and professional styling. This is more than just a haircut; it's the foundation for a sharp, tidy look that lasts longer, meaning fewer trips to the salon and more money saved for other things.

classic-business.name: Classic Business
classic-business.description: Elegant hairstyle, suitable for office environments and formal events.

modern-quiff.name: Modern Quiff
modern-quiff.description: Modern style with volume on top, showing strong personality.

textured-crop.name: Textured Crop
textured-crop.description: Short hair with natural texture, easy to style and suitable for all activities.

side-part-classic.name: Side Part Classic
side-part-classic.description: Classic side-part hairstyle, elegant and suitable for all ages.

pompadour-modern.name: Modern Pompadour
pompadour-modern.description: Modern version of the classic pompadour, making a bold statement.

buzz-cut-styled.name: Styled Buzz Cut
buzz-cut-styled.description: Refined buzz cut, strong and easy to maintain.

messy-fringe.name: Messy Fringe
messy-fringe.description: Natural fringe style, perfect for a youthful, dynamic look.

slicked-back.name: Slicked Back
slicked-back.description: Sleek, combed-back hairstyle, showing elegance and power.

fade-haircut.title: Cut Fade
fade-haircut.subtitle: Men's Skin Fade
fade-haircut.description: Super neat, modern fade with high precision.
fade-haircut.longDescription: Want a super neat, modern fade? Our experts will get it perfect every time. Expect an extremely clean, precise fade that holds its form, helping you get the most out of your haircut and reducing the cost of frequent touch-ups.

high-fade.name: High Fade
high-fade.description: High fade for strong contrast, suitable for modern, dynamic styles.

mid-fade.name: Mid Fade
mid-fade.description: Balanced mid fade, suitable for most face shapes and styles.

low-fade.name: Low Fade
low-fade.description: Subtle low fade for a soft, natural transition.

skin-fade.name: Skin Fade
skin-fade.description: Fade down to the skin for the sharpest, boldest effect.

temple-fade.name: Temple Fade
temple-fade.description: Fade only at the temples, keeping length elsewhere.

burst-fade.name: Burst Fade
burst-fade.description: Arc-shaped fade around the ear for a unique, bold effect.

hot-shave.title: Hot Shave
hot-shave.subtitle: Hot Towel Shave
hot-shave.description: Experience a traditional shave with relaxing hot towels.
hot-shave.longDescription: Treat yourself to the ultimate traditional shave. Our classic hot towel shave delivers a close, comfortable shave and rejuvenates your skin. It's not just shaving; it's a relaxing mini facial that boosts skin health, giving you double the benefits for one price.

classic-hot-towel.name: Classic Hot Towel Shave
classic-hot-towel.description: Traditional shave with hot towels for maximum relaxation and smooth skin.

premium-beard-shave.name: Premium Beard Shave
premium-beard-shave.description: Premium beard shave with special facial care products and relaxing massage.

mustache-trim-shave.name: Mustache Trim & Shave
mustache-trim-shave.description: Precise mustache trim and shave for sharp lines and a refined look.

full-face-shave.name: Full Face Shave
full-face-shave.description: Full face shave with professional technique for perfectly smooth skin.

precision-shave.name: Precision Shave
precision-shave.description: Precise shave with a traditional straight razor for perfectionists.

beard-trim.title: Beard Trimming
beard-trim.subtitle: Beard Trim
beard-trim.description: Professional beard trimming and shaping to keep your beard perfect.
beard-trim.longDescription: Keep your beard in top shape with professional trimming and shaping. A professionally shaped beard not only looks better but also grows more evenly, making it easier to care for at home and saving you time.

full-beard-trim.name: Full Beard Trim
full-beard-trim.description: Trim the entire beard, shaping it to balance and suit your face.

goatee-style.name: Goatee Style
goatee-style.description: Modern goatee style, perfect for a youthful and bold look.

mustache-trim.name: Mustache Trim
mustache-trim.description: Professional mustache trim for sharp lines and a refined look.

beard-shaping.name: Beard Shaping
beard-shaping.description: Shape your beard to your personal style, highlighting your facial features.

designer-beard.name: Designer Beard
designer-beard.description: Premium designer beard with intricate lines, showing unique style.

corporate-beard.name: Corporate Beard
corporate-beard.description: Office-style beard, neat and professional, suitable for the workplace.

vintage-beard.name: Vintage Beard
vintage-beard.description: Classic beard style, exuding masculinity and gentlemanly elegance.

women-hair.title: Women's Hair Services
women-hair.subtitle: Hair Services for Women
women-hair.description: Ladies, at Winchair Beauty Spa, we strive to turn your hair into a beautiful, sustainable asset.

womens-haircut.title: Women's Haircut
womens-haircut.subtitle: Women's Haircut
womens-haircut.description: More than just a haircut, this is a bespoke styling experience that highlights your natural beauty and fits your lifestyle.
womens-haircut.longDescription: More than just a haircut, this is a personalized styling experience designed to enhance your natural beauty and fit your lifestyle. Includes a luxurious shampoo and professional styling. Our experts provide thorough consultation to ensure your hairstyle is perfect, meaning you rarely have a 'bad hair day' and gain priceless confidence.

layered-cut.name: Layered Cut
layered-cut.description: Soft layers for volume, suitable for many styles.

bob-cut.name: Bob Cut
bob-cut.description: Classic, elegant bob, easy to style and suitable for all ages.

pixie-cut.name: Pixie Cut
pixie-cut.description: Short, dynamic, and bold style for those who love a strong look.

hair-coloring.title: Hair Coloring
hair-coloring.subtitle: Colour
hair-coloring.description: Ready for a vibrant new hair color or a fresh update to your current shade?
hair-coloring.longDescription: Ready for a vibrant new hair color or a fresh update to your current shade? Our stylists will help you choose the perfect tone. Our professional coloring uses high-quality products to protect hair health, ensuring long-lasting color and shine, helping prevent costly damage later.

full-colour.name: Full Colour
full-colour.description: All-over color for a fresh, vibrant look.

root-touch-up.name: Root Touch-Up
root-touch-up.description: Refreshes color at the roots for an even, natural look.

ombre.name: Ombre
ombre.description: Gradient coloring from dark to light for a modern, natural effect.

hair-highlights.title: Highlights
hair-highlights.subtitle: Highlight
hair-highlights.description: Add depth and sparkle to your hair with beautiful highlights.
hair-highlights.longDescription: Add depth and sparkle to your hair with beautiful highlights, customized for a natural sun-kissed effect or a bold statement. Our professional technique ensures seamless blending and natural regrowth, giving you long-lasting beauty with less need for frequent touch-ups.

natural-highlights.name: Natural Highlights
natural-highlights.description: Soft highlights for a naturally bright, sun-kissed look.

bold-highlights.name: Bold Highlights
bold-highlights.description: Bold highlights for a strong, standout statement.

hair-perm.title: Perm
hair-perm.subtitle: Perm
hair-perm.description: Add volume, body, and beautiful waves or curls to your hair.
hair-perm.longDescription: Want to add volume, body, and beautiful waves or curls to your hair? Our professional perm service delivers just that. We create the perfect hair texture, giving you consistent, beautiful results for months—an excellent value for your investment.

beach-waves.name: Beach Waves
beach-waves.description: Soft, natural waves for a relaxed beachy look.

tight-curls.name: Tight Curls
tight-curls.description: Tight curls for a dynamic, bold look.

hair-straightening.title: Hair Straightening
hair-straightening.subtitle: Relaxer
hair-straightening.description: Dreaming of smooth, shiny, and manageable hair?
hair-straightening.longDescription: Dreaming of smooth, shiny, and manageable hair? Our professional straightening treatments reduce frizz and boost shine. Carefully performed to minimize damage and maximize smoothness, making your daily styling much faster and easier—a real time-saver!

classic-straight.name: Classic Straight
classic-straight.description: Sleek, straight hair for an elegant, professional look.

hair-updo.title: Updo
hair-updo.subtitle: Updo
hair-updo.description: Perfect for special occasions, exquisitely styled updos.
hair-updo.longDescription: Perfect for special occasions, our updos are exquisitely styled for an elegant and memorable look. With professional updos, you are guaranteed perfection and all-day/night hold, so you can enjoy your moment without worrying about your hair.

classic-updo.name: Classic Updo
classic-updo.description: Classic, elegant updo for weddings or formal events.

messy-bun.name: Messy Bun
messy-bun.description: Loose, natural bun for a relaxed yet attractive style.

kids-hair.title: Kids' Hair Services
kids-hair.subtitle: Hair Services for Kids
kids-hair.description: At Winchair Beauty Spa, we provide a fun and comfortable environment for our youngest clients.

boys-haircut.title: Boys' Haircut
boys-haircut.subtitle: Kid's Haircut
boys-haircut.description: A friendly, hassle-free haircut experience for boys, ensuring they leave with a stylish and comfortable look.
boys-haircut.longDescription: A friendly, hassle-free haircut experience for boys, ensuring they leave with a trendy and comfortable hairstyle. Our patient stylists ensure a positive experience, making future haircuts stress-free for both kids and parents.

classic-kid-cut.name: Classic Kid Cut
classic-kid-cut.description: Neat hairstyle, age-appropriate and easy to maintain.

spiky-cut.name: Spiky Cut
spiky-cut.description: Dynamic style with spiked top, perfect for energetic boys.

girls-haircut.title: Girls' Haircut
girls-haircut.subtitle: Girl's Haircut
girls-haircut.description: Trendy, age-appropriate hairstyles for girls, styled according to their preferences and hair type.
girls-haircut.longDescription: Trendy, age-appropriate hairstyles for girls, styled according to their preferences and hair type. We ensure the style is not only cute but also easy for parents to manage, providing a practical beauty solution for busy Canadian families.

bob-kid-cut.name: Bob Kid Cut
bob-kid-cut.description: Cute short bob, easy to care for and perfect for girls.

layered-kid-cut.name: Layered Kid Cut
layered-kid-cut.description: Lightly layered style, adds volume and easy to style for girls.

hair-treatments.title: Hair Treatments & Styling
hair-treatments.subtitle: Hair Treatments & Styling
hair-treatments.description: Invest in the health and vitality of your hair with specialized treatments at Winchair Beauty Spa.

hair-wash.title: Hair Wash
hair-wash.subtitle: Wash
hair-wash.description: Refreshing hair wash followed by professional blow-drying, leaving your hair clean and light.
hair-wash.longDescription: A refreshing hair wash followed by professional blow-drying, leaving your hair clean and light. Sometimes, all you need is a professional wash to instantly refresh your look and save time on a busy day.

wash-and-style.title: Wash & Style
wash-and-style.subtitle: Wash & Style
wash-and-style.description: Enjoy a luxurious wash followed by beautiful styling with a brush or curling/straightening iron.
wash-and-style.longDescription: Enjoy a luxurious wash followed by beautiful styling with a brush or curling/straightening iron, perfect for a finished look. Let our experts give you that 'just stepped out of the salon' look with ease, saving you time and effort styling at home.

sleek-blowout.name: Sleek Blowout
sleek-blowout.description: Smooth, shiny blowout for an elegant and professional look.

voluminous-curls.name: Voluminous Curls
voluminous-curls.description: Big, bouncy curls for a glamorous and standout look.

hair-treatment.title: Nourishing Hair Therapy
hair-treatment.subtitle: Nourishing Shampoo Therapy
hair-treatment.description: Deeply nourish and restore vitality to your hair with our specialized nourishing shampoo therapy.
hair-treatment.longDescription: Deeply nourish and restore vitality to your hair with our specialized nourishing shampoo therapy, restoring health and shine. This intensive treatment repairs damage, adds incredible shine, and improves manageability, ultimately prolonging hair health and reducing the need for frequent deep conditioning at home.

scalp-massage.title: Scalp Massage
scalp-massage.subtitle: Scalp Massage
scalp-massage.description: Immerse yourself in a deeply relaxing and therapeutic scalp massage.
scalp-massage.longDescription: Immerse yourself in a deeply relaxing and therapeutic scalp massage. This is not just pampering; it actively promotes blood circulation to the scalp, encourages healthier hair growth, and provides wonderful stress relief. It's an investment in both your hair's vitality and your overall well-being.

esthetic-services.title: Esthetic Services
esthetic-services.subtitle: Esthetic Services
esthetic-services.description: The beauty services at Winchair Beauty Spa are designed to enhance your natural radiance and promote overall wellness, all while delivering exceptional value.

facial-treatment.title: Facial Treatment
facial-treatment.subtitle: Facial (1 Hour)
facial-treatment.description: Rejuvenate your skin with our customized facial treatments.
facial-treatment.longDescription: Rejuvenate your skin with our customized facial treatments—designed to cleanse, nourish, and restore your complexion. Our experts analyze your skin to ensure you receive the exact treatment for your skin type, resulting in noticeable, long-lasting improvements that boost your skin health and help you avoid wasting money on unsuitable products.

hydrating-facial.name: Hydrating Facial
hydrating-facial.description: Deeply hydrating facial, ideal for dry or dehydrated skin.

anti-aging-facial.name: Anti-Aging Facial
anti-aging-facial.description: Anti-aging facial therapy to reduce wrinkles and increase firmness.

body-waxing.title: Body Waxing
body-waxing.subtitle: Waxing
body-waxing.description: Achieve soft, smooth skin with professional waxing services.
body-waxing.longDescription: Achieve soft, smooth skin with our professional waxing services for various areas. Our skilled estheticians ensure minimal discomfort and longer-lasting results compared to shaving, meaning fewer waxing sessions and more time for you to enjoy life.

bikini-wax.name: Bikini Wax
bikini-wax.description: Bikini area waxing for a neat and confident look.

full-leg-wax.name: Full Leg Wax
full-leg-wax.description: Full leg waxing for smooth and clean skin.

eyelash-extension.title: Eyelash Extension
eyelash-extension.subtitle: Eyelash Extension
eyelash-extension.description: Enhance your natural beauty with longer, fuller lashes.
eyelash-extension.longDescription: Enhance your natural beauty with longer, fuller lashes, professionally applied for a stunning look. Imagine waking up every morning with naturally beautiful lashes! Eyelash extensions eliminate the need for daily mascara, saving you precious time in your morning routine and giving you effortless allure.

classic-lash.name: Classic Lash
classic-lash.description: Natural lash extensions, one extension per natural lash for an elegant look.

volume-lash.name: Volume Lash
volume-lash.description: Volume lash extensions, multiple extensions per natural lash for a dramatic effect.

microblading.title: Microblading PMU
microblading.subtitle: Microblading PMU
microblading.description: Achieve perfectly shaped, defined brows with semi-permanent microblading.
microblading.longDescription: Achieve perfectly shaped, defined brows with our semi-permanent microblading service, including one free touch-up. Imagine waking up with flawless brows every day! This service saves you countless hours of daily brow makeup and provides a long-lasting, natural solution for perfect brows.

natural-microblading.name: Natural Microblading
natural-microblading.description: Natural brows, softly shaped to suit any face.

bold-microblading.name: Bold Microblading
bold-microblading.description: Bold, defined brows for a strong statement.
